trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Ger stöd för designtid i en visuell designer för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal"> </xref> Web server-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control allows a text string to be used as a control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontrollen kan en textsträng som ska användas som en kontroll på en webbsida.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: I en visuell designer när du växlar från källan till designvyn källkoden markup som beskriver en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontroll analyseras och en designläge version av kontrollen har skapats i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: När du växlar tillbaka till vyn källa beständig markering källkoden designläge kontrollen och redigeras i koden för webbsidan.

trans-unit.source: The LiteralDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LiteralDesigner ger designläge stöd för den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a design-time change to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>metoden anropas när det finns en designläge ändring av den associerade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt skapar en ny instans av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>klassen när det skapas den associerade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontroll eller en kopia av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontroll i designvyn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LiteralDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när en ändring av den associerade kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged-metoden anropas när den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>händelsen för den associerade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>kontrollen aktiveras.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a `Properties` grid change).
trans-unit.target: Detta är vanligtvis som svar på en egenskap som har ändrats på kontrollen (till exempel en `Properties` rutnätet ändring).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: OnComponentChanged skapar en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>objektet och sedan anropar den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>bas-metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Det objekt som är källa för händelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som innehåller informationen om händelsen.
